setup.title: üìã Emergency Contacts Setup
setup.guide_title: How to set up your emergency button
setup.step1: Activate your subscription and add only one temporary alert contact until the setup is fully complete.
setup.step2: Click on 'Test Emergency' to simulate the system. Make sure everything works without errors.
setup.step3: If the test is successful, click on the 'Real Emergency' button. Save the generated link on your phone and keep the page open (IMPORTANT).
setup.step4: Identify which browser you are using. If during the real test you get a 'Prompt' to install the app, do so and skip step 5.
setup.step5:
For Android (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Opera): tap the three dots in the top-right corner and select 'Add to Home screen'.
For iPhone: tap the share icon (a square with an arrow pointing up) and select 'Add to Home Screen'.
setup.step6: Now add the rest of the contacts you want to alert. ‚ö†Ô∏è Do this only after confirming the setup works correctly, to avoid sending alerts or using credits during testing.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
privacy.data_collection_text: We collect data such as your name, phone number, and location data (if applicable) only for application functionality.
privacy.data_usage_text: Your data is used solely to send emergency alerts, manage your account, and improve our services.
privacy.third_parties_text: We do not share your data with third parties except those required to deliver alerts (e.g., Twilio for SMS).
privacy.security_text: We take measures to protect your data using encryption, authentication, and secure storage practices.
privacy.user_rights_text: You can access, correct, or delete your data at any time through your account or by contacting us.

trial.section2_title: üîí Why do we ask for a payment method?
trial.payment_explanation: While the trial is free, alerts are sent via SMS using Twilio, which charges per message (~‚Ç¨0.10 per contact). We ask for a card just to ensure those real costs are covered, even during testing.
trial.post_trial_info: Your subscription will automatically renew after the 3-day free trial unless you cancel. You can cancel or change plans anytime from your dashboard.
